name: Ogre, Rockchewer
description: The Rockchewer Ogre is a massive creature with immense physical strength and notable abilities related to stone. It has a high Hit Point total, allowing it to withstand significant damage.
memorable: Its ability to deal double damage to stone objects with its bite makes it a unique threat in rocky terrain.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate foes in battle and manipulate the rocky environment to its advantage.
relations: Often encountered with other giants or ogres; might serve as a minion to a stronger giant.
environment: Commonly found in rocky areas or mountainous regions.
strengths: Possesses damage resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, making it tough against standard weaponry.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and mental stats make it easy to hit and less effective in social situations.
attacks: Can deliver two powerful Slam attacks or a combination of a Bite attack and a Slam, emphasizing its melee prowess.
most_powerful_ability: Stone Chomper allows it to deal double damage to stone structures and objects, adding to its threat in rocky environments.
senses: Has darkvision that allows it to see in low-light areas.
skills: Somewhat perceptive with a +1 modifier to Perception, but has a passive Perception score of 9.
additional_information: Capable of ranged attacks by throwing rocks.
Can use Gravel Spray to control area and deal damage.
Has strategic abilities that allow for tactical advantages in combat.
Quick Chew ability recharges its Chew Rock for further damage potential.
Can catch small rocks hurled at it with its Rock Catching reaction.
test_queries: huge ogre with rock crushing abilities
powerful melee giant from rocky environments
ogre that deals double damage to stone
bruiser creature with high hit points
giant with area damage through gravel spray
